entities.description: The code representing specific types of criminal offenses.
The description of the criminal offense.
The unweighted frequency of occurrences recorded in the survey.
The percentage of total cases corresponding to each offense code.
Different categories of responses available in the dataset.

relationships.description: Relates each offense code to its description.
Indicates the number of occurrences recorded for each offense code.
Indicates the percentage of total cases for each offense code.
Represents the different response options available in the survey.
